main.name: Jitender Singh

main.bio: I have progressive experience and knowledge across multiple domains. Self-starter, highly analytical, team-player, with advanced software engineering and project management skills. Looking to grow my experience while wearing multiple hats within the organization.
main.contactmessage: PLEASE CONTACT ME VIA EMAIL OR PHONE

work.description: Build Complex Collection an ecommerce website based around purchasing collectable sneakers. Complex Collection utilizes React for the front end as well as Redux for all state management. The site is built on a Node server and uses Axios to handle all HTTP requests between the front and back end. All customer and product data is hosted on a PostgreSQL database and transferred over an encrypted connection when it is called upon. Stripe API has been integrated to handle all payments with cards to insure the security of the users payment info.

The site allows users to watch movies brought in from google drive. Users can search for the latest movie as well as being able to request a film. Users can search through our database which is linked with IMDB allows them to view the descriptions of the film as well as its rating. The Club utilizes react for the front end as well as redux for all state management. The main tech stack used is javascript, node, react, redux, HTML5, CSS, PostgreSQL.

projects.title: Complex Collection
projects.category: An ecommerece website for collectable sneakers.

testimonials.text: I worked with Jitender at Well's Fargo for a year. He was able to pick up on new concepts fairly quickly which was a great advantage to our team! Jitender was always willing to train new members and quickly became the go to guy for anything software related!
